text: This should be New Hardware Day at Intel. Hoping we'll get our hands on the Star Flats tomorrow.
Cool!
Guys I'm at a doc appt on sandy and it's running 30 min behind. I should be there in time for stand up, but may be just a couple min late.
I'm at the car repair place with no shuttle driver in sight.
I'm still chugging along myself. Let's check in via slack.

* Edison gateway is scanning for all caps and can write. Building out functions now to trigger cap writes from the API.
* Minor updates to cap firmware, including pushbutton code and fade on/off
* Anticipating hardware arrival at Intel today. Will ping Greg to check status, but I anticipate I’ll be out there at least part of tomorrow for hardware bringup. Will keep <@U02618EV1> posted on plans.
:thumbsup:
I am speaking w/ Marc & Shashi about Q1 next year.
Did we send out the Reportedly post yet? Should I take a stab at it if not?
Would like that to go out well before my 3pm meeting today
<@U02F8LF2X>: What’s on tap with the wine rack? And do we need to check in w/ Shashi & Intel on the cap production?
Re: Reportedly, I can take a stab at it. Will send a preview to all here first.
cool! thanks, <@U02618EV1>!
I’ll make a list of folks to invite to it (but I won’t add them until we test/draft)
Other update - Shashi intro’d us to the General Manager of Urban Farmer. I’m meeting him tomorrow for lunch. He’s a big proponent of technology and cuisine.
(He has the giant, 117 piece 3D printed LED cow that Shashi made)
since you weren’t all on the thread: fab house is trying to push star flat delivery by a week, which is not what they promised. Kevin’s working on it.
hmm. have any of the other boards arrived?
nope.
just our LED boards.
can we check in on those as well?
they’re all included in the Star Flat boards that are being fabbed
Sent out a dummy report a few minutes back. Did you get the email?
i did
the video is still the old one - want me to update it with the new one ABby made?
Good catch. I just fixed it.
oops did i send you the wrong link gaston?
No, it was the right link. I think my player moved to next video in the queue and I copied that URL.
Apologies for the numerous Reportedly emails. Just made the last update on my end.
cool - found out Marc and Shashi are joining in person for our meeting. So I’ll share the video with them in person and send the reportedly update to the rest of the team afterwards
Cool.
Video looks so great. Feel like Abby and Phillip deserve an additional shout out. Marc and Shashi are bound to be very impressed. Thank you for taking the time guys!
No problem!!

Sommely meeting went well. We’ve unlocked $50k of spend from Shashi on marketing / demo as a stop gap between current product and next gen of hardware. Going to update our Reportedly post and send to Shashi & crew.
does that mean sxsw?
no sxsw.
not for that budget - i’ll find you to discuss.
